text: @DavidBegnaud @fred_guttenberg @POTUS He's literaly there to DISRUPT the spread of #coronavirus. Involving "rational markets' in this, makes it less efficient, because we have a Federal government profiting off of selling crucially needed products to the states - who will pay anything for them right now.
